Food is amazing. It was just like a home cooked meal someone spent all day cooking. 

Service was polite. Restaurant is very small. The neighborhood was not very nice however. They would attract more customers being in a better spot in the city.

We went with some friends and had a great time! Reservations are a must as it is a small restaurant. The servers are friendly but do fall behind a bit on drink refills sometimes, still nothing major and we will definitely come again sometime.

Love, love love, this little shop. I'm from NJ where our Polish food is Legendary, however i saw this place on Diners Drive-In's and Dives so I thought I'd check it out. If you love Polish "soul food" then make sure you stop by and tell them Martha from NJ sent you!
I ordered the Polish plate, and was not disappointed. Comes with stuffed cabbage, Hunter's stew, pierogi, and kielbasa. Food was amazing.

name: Potato Tomato
address: 7 Ellery St Ste. B, Boston, MA 02127, USA

name: Panera Bread
address: 8 Allstate Rd Suite 3, Dorchester, MA 02125, USA
reviews: First time went there . The place is really big. Staff are very nice. The food wasn't too bad.

I have been coming here since the day it opened. The staff has pleased my guests and myself continuously. The food has been superb, love most everything there from soups to nuts (in the pecan braid), smile. Good food, neat place! They’re the best!

It's your standard Panera experience here: good, fresh food at a reasonable price. 

The people here are friendly, but when I was here, towards closing time, it was pretty dirty and cluttered.

Panera doesn't serve Coke, which is why I almost never come here. It's too bad.

There is plenty of parking right outside.

Their salads and breads are always fresh and tasty. Bought tomato soup from there, but wasn't as satisfied as I expected,may be not the best place for soups. Place is lovely and staff is always helpful. Everything clean and tidy. No complaints.

Considering this was the only bakery 2 steps away from our hotel, we got curious & gave it a shot: and I guess we were in luck - service was ok both days we had breakfast there. On the first day it really took a while till we got the bagels (we were told they had some trouble in the kitchen), but on the second day we just ordered "to go" and they stepped on it - & the sandwiches were fine - maybe a bit too small (according to my husband). 
What I particularly liked: the delicious muffins!

name: The Bistro – Eat. Drink. Connect.®
reviews: This place obviously knows how to treat their clients. Consistently with a very friendly mindset. The food is affordably priced, always delicious and clean.

Since Courtyard is quite far away from the commercial area, The Bistro provides a very convenient quick bite service. The service are great, I found waitress here are very welcoming. The booth seats are interesting with some 60s’ style, which each unit has a TV. The food served with big portion but somehow overpriced. My salad is $12.95, it was very tasty but feel pricey.
Bomb foood
Yummie
This isn't a real restaurant.  It's a hotel breakfast bar. Also, the hours listed are inaccurate.

name: Dunkin'
reviews: This dunkin donuts is always on point. They're friendly and fast. I'm always in and out in a matter of about one to two minutes. 😊
Enjoy my ice coffees. The crew know how I like my coffee.

Love dds best around. I was mad going in their today. Don't know if he didn't inderstand my English or because he was on he cell phone the whole time i was at the counter. But he messed up my order. This use to be my favorite location beause its on my way to work. Not no more.
So nice. I am watching all of my calories but had a sweet tooth, I asked for two of the munchkins and they gave me four. Very sweet
Love this store because wonderful customer service ❤️❤️❤️💙💙💙

name: Red Line Pizza
reviews: love this place. it's family owned, which, really does make a difference. They are personable to the community, offer a wide selection of food items that which are cooked well. Always sanitary and prompt. I suggest going in to visit just to meet the owner he's a great guy.
The buffalo chicken pizza is delicious

This restaurant is definitely one of the most pleasant place in the area. Every time I visit this place I am profoundly glad. They keep their very high  standard service and the highest level of food  they serve. You can never go wrong with this restaurant. Very  recommended.
Best buffalo chicken pizza in town 🐔
I've only eaten here once but the pizza I ordered was very undercooked. Besides that the workers were VERY friendly. I felt really comfortable there

name: Andrew Square House of Pizza
reviews:
I placed an order online used a coupon got charged an extra $2 for adding an extra toppin then got a call from Andrews saying they will charge me another $10 and they will not honor the coupon. It's a shame that during this time when I was trying to support my local business they would try to overcharging me when I was already spending $50 not include the tip. I have done it before in person and never had a problem I don't understand why they would have a problem now specially when I am a good customer.
I will never order from them again.
Love it.

I got a pepperoni pizza and it was so greedy and soggy that my husband and I threw it out. The curly fries were oddly chewy and no flavor. We wanted an easy night for vday but I really want to enjoy a good pizza. This was not it.
My favorite pizza spot. Have to visit type of place. Parking lot in back. Food at it's best.
Goood pizza n more

name: Molly's Farmhouse Coffee
reviews:
Very nice small cosy spot to grab a cup of wonderful coffee. They have different flavors, but it’s not an artificial syrup, which make it very tasteful and delicious 👍 
They also have some sandwiches and wraps chose, and they cook after the order, so it’s freshly made from real stuff. I always get a falafel wrap and it’s good. This time I tried their new Molly’s cold wrap, with mozzarella, tomatoes and basil - I think I found my new favorite breakfast wrap!

I never cared for iced coffee until I went to Molly's Farmhouse. Their frappuccino is to die for.
The shop was clean, the breakfast wrap was fresh and It's a nice atmosphere to get a quick breakfast.
I really liked the cafe style outdoor seating.
The service was good and the owner and his wife we're very nice.
If you're an avid coffee drinker, this is the place to go.
I been here once it's good
Best coffee I've had in Boston so far. Their cold brew is mellow and smooth, so they don't use their old beans. They know what's up when it comes to brewing true.
Love their flavored frappuccinos

name: Wine & Spirits
address: 295 Old Colony Ave, Boston, MA 02127, USA
reviews: Right next door to rotary convenience shared parking lot grab a new ohone play the lottery get a sandwich pay bill or get money order like 1 stop shop.
Staff are rude
Buenos precios para  el lugar que está ubicado.

name: Supreme House of Pizza
address: 313 Old Colony Ave, Boston, MA 02127, USA
reviews: Amazing pizza and subs for a great price! Very nice workers and they sell a variety of different foods! Would recommend.

Manager is completely rude. I called because my order was wrong and instead of listening he was speaking over me and yelling at me. Mind you I order from there all time. For some reason when the manger himself takes order it is never correct. Hes unprofessional and rude. I would never give them my money again.
The place is very out dated and need some serious remodeling and has the most nastiest dirtiest bathroom I've ever seen at any restaurants. The health department needs to pay them a visit one day!!!

You guys know you're my favorite pizza in Boston for your large thin crust 'Santorini White Pizza'.

Let me give you just a little corrective criticism.

Whenever I order the 'Santorini White Pizza' it's always great, but its cooked a little different depending on who made it. 

Sometimes it's cooked with big, thick chunks of caramelized onions and not much garlic or other seasonings which makes it a little gross.

Then there's someone over that makes it absolutely perfect, the onions are very thin cut and its popping with flavor with a good amount of seasoning. 

I got a perfect version of the pizza tonight, its 8/5/19 at 8:00pm

So if you can figure out whoever cooked my pizza and make all of them come out like that, you guys would be perfezionare!
I WILL NEVER HATE THIS PLACE,I LOVE ♥️ THIS PLACE AND ALL THE STAFF THE OWNERS ,BEAUTIFUL AND KIND HUMAN PEOPLE

name: ROTARY VARIETY
address: 309 Old Colony Ave, South Boston, MA 02127, USA
reviews: I live across the street for almost 2 years now. This place has THE BEST coffee I’ve ever had hands down! I used to be a DD’s adicta but never waste money on Dunkin’ anymore. For a  convenience store, they have really good prices on everything. They have a cellphone store and check cashiers in the back. They are super friendly and really make you feel part of the community.
There coffee is the best n Jay n his wife always makes it the way u want it n it's reasonable priced

The rotary has the best coffee in boston it taste better then any other cofee I've tasted, they have lots of different flavors and their prices are great! The rotary also has great sandwiches as well anytime your in the southie district try them
They have most everything u could need at a local convenient store, fruit, candy, food, loytery, keno, cell phone store, check cashiers, coffee counter wuth breakfast sandwiches freshly made.
Believe or not this store have best coffee and best price too.

name: Veterans Park
reviews: Is fun there is comp there

Lots of drunks sitting on the benches drinking right in open...even smoking crack...sonetimes cant even stop to rest cuz a bunch of drunk homeless men staring at u like they never seen a woman before...needs to be cleaned up

Nice basketball court. That is until the kids rip the hoops off and your left with just rim. Also had a nice tennis court, the only time I use that is when I'm walking my dog. Hopefully no one got any doggie surprises. Sometimes drunks go to the seats and drink and do drugs. Come early in the morning to early afternoon to prevent this.
Quite nice
Oh the memories hanging out there, throwing the basketball around, kids playing hockey in the courts. They are tennis courts that when nobody is playing tennis they use it for hockey.

name: Telegraph Hill
reviews: Great local bar/restaurant... great choice of microbrews... great place to watch the Sox or Bruins
Great food.. wine glasses not that clean.
I very much enjoyed my stay. Great food.Great service.
The Hill burger is huge but pretty good. It was just me and the bartender for about 3 hours on a Wednesday afternoon.
Nice little bar. Onion rings were fantastic. Turkey club great, burger was great, cobb salad was very fresh. Server was very helpful and pleasant
